name: Yakamoto Clean Sweep
description:
A FPC (First Person Cleaner) about creating spotless perfection with pinpoint accuracy and speed!

You are hired by the Yakamoto corporation to carry out a very important job: Making sure the place is immaculately clean. As a professional, you will utilize your full arsenal from brooms to aerosols to make sure not even one speck of dust is left behind. Wall run and slide your way through the Yakamoto corporation building, dodging turrets, lasers on your quest for spotless perfection. 

They are grit and grime, without mercy. But you, you are worse. Clean and spray, until it is done.

Yakamoto Clean Sweep is the latest innovative title in clean em’ up style games! Taking place across multiple sprawling 3d levels, you play as one of two contract cleaners in the Yakamoto Corporation of Japan, to save your beloved boss or find your lost sister!

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Sprint
  • LCTRL - Crouch
  • Space - Jump
  • LMB - Shoot
  • 123, Scroll - Change weapons
  • Escape - Open pause menu
